headline: NRG Energy (NRG) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: NRG (NRG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +9.09% and +12.00%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
